import appReducer from"./reducers";import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import{persistCurrentState,supportsPersistence}from"./utilities/persistence";import throttle from"lodash/throttle";import thunk from"redux-thunk";var devtools=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__();var middlewares=compose(applyMiddleware(thunk),devtools||function(a){return a;});var store=createStore(appReducer,middlewares);// persist parts of the store whenever it changes.
if(supportsPersistence()){store.subscribe(throttle(function(){persistCurrentState(store.getState(),["bar","settings","favourites"]);}));}export default store;
